content: CFS-TTS MD P FS Top Track Plug Firestop Preformed solution for top-of-wall drywall joints under metal deck – eliminates the need for slow, messy stuff-and-spray firestop ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Ready to use joints and cavity barriers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick and simple installation – one-step firestop for under corrugated metal deck designed to save you time and labor Significantly faster than traditional top-of-wall firestopping methods, especially stuff-and-spray or castle-cut drywall – helping you to meet critical deadlines Clean and practical – zero waste firestop without the spray, mess, equipment and power source Foil-protected plugs and covers – provide a tight smoke and sound seal without exposing installers to mineral wool Easier to inspect – printed outer foil shows the manufacturer, even after installation Applications Firestop, smoke and sound seal for head-of-wall joints between top track/gypsum and corrugated metal deck slabs or metal roof decks CFS-TTS MD OS is suitable for various track sizes, applications and joints around the beam For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Joints Movement: Yes Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Application | Joints | Movement | Yes | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2226879 - FS top track plug CFS-TTS MD P1.5 - Package Size 360 pc - 2226878 - FS top track plug CFS-TTS MD P2 - Package Size 250 pc - 2226877 - FS top track plug CFS-TTS MD P3 - Package Size 100 pc
